description:
Level up your Python game and build intelligent applications without
breaking a sweat over infrastructure woes. In this session, explore how
to take your Python app from **code to cloud** on a *serverless*
*containers* platform – *Azure Container Apps*, with *no
containerization knowledge needed*. Leverage its built-in resilient
platform capabilities to build APIs with popular frameworks like
*FastAPI*. Fulfill your *ML* needs for frameworks like *PyTorch* with
its *GPU* compute options. Easily integrate with *Azure OpenAI* to build
**LLM-based applications** for scenarios like *RAG*, *chatbots* and
more, as well as mitigate any risks to your **security posture** with
*Azure Container Apps*. Join us for an end-to-end development to
deployment experience on how to build an intelligent Python app.
title: Build an Intelligent Python App, No Infra Hassles! (Sponsor: Microsoft)
